files.name: select-controlled-demo.tsx
files.content: "use client" import { useState } from "react" import type { Key } from "react-aria-components" import { Description, Select } from "ui" export const movies = [ { id: 1, title: "Inception" }, { id: 2, title: "The Dark Knight" }, { id: 3, title: "Interstellar" }, { id: 4, title: "The Matrix" }, { id: 5, title: "Pulp Fiction" }, ] export default function SelectControlledDemo() { const [movie, setMovie] = useState("") return ( <> You have selected: {movie} ) }
